content.rendered: You asked, we delivered. Announcing a new addition to our Clear Creek rafting slate: Full Day rafting trips! Our Beginner-Intermediate Rafting Trip starts with the dozen rapids of our Beginner section. After a break for a hearty lunch, hit the wild whitewater of our Intermediate Clear Creek rafting trip. The Advanced Full Day rafting trip on Clear Creek runs over 20 miles of advanced whitewater. Start with a Class IV section not available on our other rafting trips, then blast through our Intermediate section of continuous Class III and IV. After lunch, head down the most challenging section of Clear Creek through Class IV and V rapids. Right now through April 8 get 20% off both of these trips. See our rafting trip discounts for more info.  And if you haven't seen the 4,000 square foot whitewater rafting Outpost we built last year in Idaho Springs, you're overdue to visit us anyway!
